column1: Question
Tell me about yourself.
Why do you want to work for this company?
What are your strengths and weaknesses?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
Can you describe a challenging situation you've faced and how you handled it?
How do you handle stress and pressure?
What motivates you?
Why did you leave your last job?
How do you prioritize your work?
Tell me about a time when you worked as part of a team.
What are your salary expectations?
How do you stay organized?
Can you describe a time when you had to learn something new quickly?
What do you think you can bring to this role that others can't?
How do you handle failure?
Can you tell me about a time you had a conflict with a colleague and how you resolved it?
What do you like to do outside of work?
What makes you a good fit for this position?
Tell me about a time you went above and beyond at work.
How do you keep yourself motivated when working on long-term projects?
How do you manage competing priorities and deadlines?
How do you ensure the quality of your work?
Describe a time when you took the initiative to solve a problem.
How would your colleagues describe you?
How do you deal with difficult coworkers or clients?
Can you share an example of a time when you disagreed with a decision at work?
What is your approach to decision-making?
How do you handle feedback and criticism?
Can you describe a time when you had to adapt to a major change at work?
What are you most proud of achieving in your career so far?
How do you balance work and life responsibilities?
What do you consider to be your greatest professional achievement?
Tell me about a time when you had to meet a tight deadline.
How do you ensure clear communication in a team?
Can you describe a time when you helped a colleague or team member?
What do you do when you're given a task you're not sure how to complete?
How do you approach learning new skills or knowledge?
How do you handle repetitive or monotonous tasks?
Tell me about a time when you worked on a project that required creative thinking.
How do you deal with last-minute changes or urgent requests?
How do you contribute to a positive team culture?
What are your long-term career goals?
How do you handle uncertainty in your work environment?
Can you give an example of a time when you had to negotiate with a team or client?
Describe a situation where you had to make a tough decision with limited information.
What do you do to stay productive and efficient at work?
Tell me about a time you had to manage a team or lead a group of people.
How do you deal with conflicting opinions or ideas within a team?
Can you describe a time when you faced a failure, and what did you learn from it?
Why should we hire you over other candidates?
What interests you about this particular job?
How did you hear about the position?
What do you know about our organization?
How has your career so far prepared you for this position?
Why do you want to change roles?
What is your greatest professional achievement?
Tell me about your worst boss.
How good are you in a crisis?
When have you demonstrated leadership skills?
What makes you unique?
What are you hoping for from this role?
What would your first 30/60/90 days here look like?
What could you help us to do differently or better?
When have you failed?
Tell me about a time you made a mistake.
Describe a time when you faced an ethical dilemma.
What sort of criticism do you most often receive?
What sorts of things annoy you at work?
How do you tackle difficulties when they arise?
What type of work environment do you prefer?
What is your management style?
If I asked your boss or co-workers about you, what would they say?
How do you deal with pressure?
How do you like to be managed?
Where will you see yourself in the next few years?
What is your dream job?
Are you willing to relocate?
How many tennis balls can you ﬁt into a limousine? / How many pennies
If you were an animal, which one would you want to be?
If you were a superhero, what would be your superpower?
Which ﬁve people would you invite to your dream dinner party?
Sell me this pen.
Is there anything else you'd like us to know?
What other companies are you interviewing with?
When could you start?
Do you have any questions for us?
